items.text: You relax your mind and let it drift along the myriad paths that lead out from these particular mushrooms. As your consciousness spreads, you can now hear the voices more clearly. Even better, you can sense where in the cloud of the network they seem to emanating from.
Discard the Ferrymen. If there was a voice token on it, add 2
to the flora you moved the voice token to. If there wasn’t, you may search the path deck and discard for the next flora and put it into play.
